title: GlitchMates
description: A collaborative platform for developers to connect and work on projects aligned with their interests and expertise.

title: TextBehindImage
description: A modern webapp that creates stunning 3D text-behind-image effects. Users can upload images and add custom text that appears to emerge from behind the subject, creating eye-catching depth and visual impact perfect for social media, posters, and creative designs.

title: TweetDigest
description: An AI-powered tool that aggregates and summarizes content from your favorite X (Twitter) creators in one centralized dashboard.

title: GreenLeaf
description: A modern Next.js 14 waitlist template with Neon PostgreSQL, Drizzle ORM, Upstash Redis, and Resend for beautiful transactional emails.

title: PrintMoney
description: A comprehensive SaaS template designed to accelerate MVP development. Built with Next.js, featuring PostgreSQL (Neon), Drizzle ORM, Better-Auth for authentication, PostHog for analytics, Sentry for error tracking, and Stripe for payment processing.

title: WorkQueue-Py
description: A distributed background job processor built with FastAPI, Celery, and Redis â€” perfect for async task handling like emails, image processing, and more.
